ðŸ“– Summary: Perplexideez is a self-hosted, AI-powered search application built with Svelte. It allows users to search the web and their self-hosted applications using local AI agents, backed by a Postgres database and either Ollama or OpenAI compatible endpoints. It integrates with SearXNG for web searches and offers features like multi-user support, customizable models, and sharing capabilities.
